title: task 'rustc' failed at 'Box<Any>', /Users/rustbuild/src/rust-buildbot/slave/nightly-mac/build/src/libsyntax/ast_util.rs:776

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
I'm pretty sure its me who is doing something wrong but a nicer error message from rustc would be nice.

error: internal compiler error: trying to take the sizing type of str, an unsized type
